title: United States Military Academy Bicentennial Commemorative Coin Act of 1993
content: United States Military Academy Bicentennial Commemorative Coin Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue five-dollar gold coins, one-dollar silver coins, and half dollar clad coins emblematic of the US Military Academy. Mandates that surcharges collected from coin sales be paid to the Association of Graduates, US Military Academy, to assist its efforts to provide direct support to the Corps of Cadets, US Military Academy.
